author: Al Jazeera
title: US suffers worst daily death toll in the world at nearly 1,200
description: Despite half the planet living in lockdown, the virus continues to spread rapidly and claiming lives at alarming pace.
content:
The United States recorded the single deadliest day during the coronavirus pandemic with nearly 1,200 people killed.
The Johns Hopkins University reported early on Friday there were now 6,057 deaths in the US and more than 245,500 confirmed cases.
